notes: Posted by Leave Your Mark staffing agency (2-10 employees). Client company unnamed — uses AI and behavioral science for personalized experiences. Enterprise B2B/B2C SaaS platform. 775+ applicants. Reports to CTO alongside Chief Architect. No compensation listed. Healthcare exposure explicitly called out as a plus. One of the strongest overall matches seen — hits nearly every requirement directly.

requirements_matched: 10+ years engineering experience with senior leadership — 20+ years experience, 10+ years at CTO/VP/Director/Chief Architect level
Building and scaling modern B2B/B2C production systems — ilumed B2B healthcare platform (50K→90K users), Red Spot B2C scheduling (200K+ appointments)
Distributed systems, microservices, cloud platforms (AWS/Azure), DevOps — Monolith-to-microservices (Cognizant), AWS/Azure/GCP across all roles, CI/CD improving deployment frequency 50% (Red Spot)
Leading Agile teams — Agile/Scrum methodology across entire career
Executive partnership and cross-functional communication — CTO-level partnerships at ilumed and Red Spot, cross-functional with Product/Clinical/Ops
Managing distributed engineering teams across time zones — 50+ developers across US, Ukraine, Central America (Cognizant), offshore resources at MedQuest and Red Spot
High-growth SaaS or platform companies (preferred) — Scaled ilumed platform 50K→90K users, Red Spot from inception to 200K+ transactions
AI-enabled or data-driven systems (preferred) — AI/ML integration at ilumed, Perceptive (30% faster dev cycles, 40% feature adoption), Red Spot (18% cost reduction)
Regulated, security-conscious environments (preferred) — HIPAA compliance, SOC2/HITRUST certification, security architecture across career
Healthcare exposure (preferred) — Entire 20+ year career in healthcare IT
requirements_partial: Hands-on technical leadership — Architectural and strategic rather than daily coding, but deep technical background with design review and prototyping capability. Role frames it as 'roll up sleeves as needed' which fits
SaaS and PaaS platform evolution with internal tooling — Strong SaaS experience but PaaS/internal developer platform tooling less prominent in history
Behavioral science alignment — No specific behavioral science experience, but healthcare personalization and AI-driven patient engagement are adjacent
gaps: Anonymous client company — Cannot assess culture, size, stage, or domain fit beyond what's in the posting
No compensation listed — Cannot evaluate financial fit
addressable_gaps: Anonymous client — Can be resolved through recruiter conversation. Staffing agency postings are common for confidential searches
